table.style: table-layout: fixed; vertical-align: top; min-width: 320px; Margin: 0 auto; border-spacing: 0; border-collapse: collapse; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt; background-color: #F1F3F3; width: 100%;

div.style: Margin: 0 auto; min-width: 320px; max-width: 635px; overflow-wrap: break-word; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-word; background-color: #FFFFFF;
min-width: 320px; max-width: 650px; display: table-cell; vertical-align: top; width: 100%;
padding: 0px;border-top: 0px solid transparent;border-left: 0px solid transparent;border-right: 0px solid transparent;border-bottom: 0px solid transparent;
color: #333333; line-height: 160%; text-align: justify; word-wrap: break-word;
div.p:
YTH. Bapak/Ibu,
Kami ingin memberitahukan bahwa telah dilakukan Request dan membutuhkan Approval

img.title: Hero Image
img.style: outline: none;text-decoration: none;-ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;clear: both;display: inline-block !important;border: none;height: auto;float: none;width: 36%;max-width: 216px;

h1.style: margin: 0px; color: #5db4dc; line-height: 140%; text-align: center; word-wrap: break-word; font-weight: normal; font-family: 'Rubik',sans-serif; font-size: 26px;

p.span:
Hallo
. Tim kami akan segera memeriksa dan analisa terhadap request yang anda kirimkan. mohon tunggu dan lakukan cek secara berkala untuk status request.
